title: whenever i log in it tries to reconnect me to a game that was finished 2 hours ago.
body: even when i try to make a practice match it wont allow me saying that im already in game.

replies.body:
Sorry I didn't get to you when you had the issue, but for a little context you encountered what's known as a ghost game. Basically the server doesn't get the message that the game is over, even though it is. Typically it works itself out within an hour or two, though they can (very rarely) take as long as 5~. It's not something that can really be fixed manually, you just kinda have to wait for the server to catch up.

Seems like there was probably some minor server issues that resulted in an uptick in ghost games so hopefully you won't see one again anytime soon :)

It's happening to me as well, When i log in it tries to connect to the old game, i click cancel and it gets me out but then i can't start a new match. It does this everytime i close and reopen the client.
It's weird because in my match history it shows 'victory', but if i restart my client it will just connect back to the old game, so i really don't know whats happening.
exact same :( if its multiple people im sure they will help us out soon
Same problem. Also received no LP (well, no wins for promos) from the most recent game that has caused this bug and another game played yesterday. Rito help us.
It has been resolved for me as well, thank you.

My issue has been resolved !
check urs boiz
